meanings.definition: Not connected or joined to something else.
meanings.sent1: The unassociated puzzle piece didn't fit anywhere in the picture.
meanings.sent2: The keys were unassociated with any specific door in the building.
meanings.sent3: The unassociated sock ended up in the wrong laundry basket.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like unassociated islands in a vast sea of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The unassociated stars twinkled brightly in the night sky.

meanings.definition: Not having a connection or relationship with something else.
meanings.sent1: The unassociated book on the shelf had no title or author.
meanings.sent2: His unassociated remarks during the meeting confused everyone.
meanings.sent3: The unassociated cat wandered into the backyard looking for food.
meanings.sent4: The unassociated ideas floated around in his mind, never forming a coherent plan.
meanings.sent5: The unassociated clouds drifted lazily across the sky.
